parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive engine heat can cause discomfort, burns, and potentially lead to engine damage or failure, which can result in accidents or leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: the motorcycle is almost unbearable to ride
heat burns the underside of the thighs
the neutral light comes on when changing gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Low or no oil pressure can cause engine damage or failure, which can result in accidents or leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: the oil pump alignment is faulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Gearbox noise and issues can cause discomfort, distraction, and potentially lead to gearbox failure, which can result in accidents or leave the rider stranded.

The excessive noise and vibration from the transmission can cause the engine to lock up, leading to loss of control and potential accidents. The failure of the transmission can also leave the rider stranded.
symptoms: or grinding sounds from the transmission
especially in 5th and 6th gear; excessive vibration; engine lock-up; loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft compensator assembly can cause the engine to lock up, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: separation of the pressed steel cage

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The poorly designed compensating sprocket assembly can cause the engine to lock up, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: separation of the pressed steel cage

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The excessive noise and vibration from the transmission can cause rider discomfort, distraction, and potentially lead to loss of control.
symptoms: Loud whining or clanking noise from the transmission
especially in 5th and 6th gear; excessive vibration.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Brake Line Failure due to Rubbing against Frame and Clutch Cable
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brake line can cause sudden loss of braking power, leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: noise or vibration when applying the brakes.
